Package fr.ensibs.userService

Interface ManageUsersService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManageUsersServiceImpl
    public interface ManageUsersService
    Manage all the users. Each user can sign up, sign in and sign out. But only the administrator can delete a customer and get customer by its id
    Author:
    Nadjim ABASY and Robin ASPE

    • Method Detail

      • signIn

        java.lang.String signIn​(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String psw)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sign in a customer or an administrator to the pizzeria services
        Parameters:
        name - the password of the user
        psw - the password of the user
        Returns:
        A token to identify a customer or an administrator
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the user is already logged in

      • signOut

        void signOut​(java.lang.String token)
      throws InvalidTokenException,
             BadValueException
        Sign out a customer or an administrator
        Parameters:
        token - the token use during a session
        Throws:
        InvalidTokenException - If the token given is empty or doesn't exist in database
        BadValueException

      • signUp

        Person signUp​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String psw,
              java.lang.String psw_verification,
              Person.PERMISSION permission)
       throws BadValueException
        Allow users registration
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the user
        psw - the password of the user
        psw_verification - the password of the user
        permission - the permission level given to this user
        Returns:
        Message information about if the subscription was successfully done
        Throws:
        BadValueException

                                throws NoPermissionException,
                                       InvalidTokenException
        Allow to display all users subscribed to the services
        Parameters:
        token - a validate token of an existing administrator
        Returns:
        the list of all users
        Throws:
        NoPermissionException
        InvalidTokenException

      • getPersonByToken

        Person getPersonByToken​(java.lang.String token)
                 throws InvalidTokenException
        Allow to get a User from the list of all users with its token
        Parameters:
        token - the token looked up
        Returns:
        the user
        Throws:
        InvalidTokenException - if given token is empty
